flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I'd made a "Solar tracker" that just searches for the brightest source of light

with a sensor made of 4 LDR's

and 2 servo's to point to the source
guide.introduction_rendered:
I'd made a "Solar tracker" that just searches for the brightest source of light

with a sensor made of 4 LDR's

and 2 servo's to point to the source

Relevant parts
  • Servo
  • LDR Light Dependent Resistor
  • Arduino microcontroller
guide.summary:
2-axis solar tracker with a DIY 4 LDR sensor
point directly to the brightest light source (sun)
